synopsis.text:
Soujuurou Shizuki, an ordinary boy, moves to Misaki town in the late 1980s, unaware of the mystical secrets the town holds. The old mansion on the hill, rumored to be the abode of a witch, becomes his new neighboring residence. Inside the mansion, young Aoko Aozaki is learning the art of sorcery under the tutelage of Alice Kuonji, the enigmatic witch of the mansion.

Aoko, the heir to the Aozaki family, is entrusted with the responsibility of safeguarding the land on which Misaki is built. As mysterious intruders disrupt the bounded field, Aoko and Alice embark on an investigation, only to be ambushed by a mannequin. The ensuing magical battle catches Soujuurou's eye, forcing him into a world of magic and sorcery.

Now, Soujuurou must reside with the witches until a memory-erasing rune can be discovered, forever intertwining his once ordinary life with the mystical world of Aoko and Alice. As their paths converge, a captivating tale of magic, friendship, and responsibility unfolds in the twilight of the Showa era.
